languages.text: "Мы же не оставим господина Скаландра страдать в сем обреченном теле? Смерть должна стать искуплением за его грехи. И милосердием, что смоет эти... ужасные, болезненные, ядовитые цвета с его изувеченной души".

"Surely we are not going to leave Master Scalander to suffer in this doomed body, are we? Death must come as atonement for his crimes. And a mercy that will wash away these... horrible, painful, and poisonous hues from his disfigured soul."
languages.original_text: "Мы же не оставим господина Скаландра страдать в сем обреченном теле? Смерть должна стать искуплением за его грехи. И милосердием, что смоет эти... ужасные, болезненные, ядовитые цвета с его изувеченной души".

traits.locale_text: "Surely we are not going to leave Master Scalander to suffer in this doomed body? Death must become the atonement for his sins. And a mercy that will wash away these... horrible, painful, poisonous colours from his disfigured soul."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Surely we are not going to leave Master Scalander to suffer in this doomed body? Death must become the atonement for his sins. And a mercy that will wash away these... horrible, painful, poisonous colours from his disfigured soul."

traits.locale_text: "Surely we are not going to leave Master Scalander to suffer in this doomed body, are we? Death must come as atonement for his sins. And a mercy that will wash away these... horrible, painful, and poisonous hues from his disfigured soul."

traits.locale_text: "Surely we are not going to leave Master Scalander to suffer in this doomed body, are we? Death must come as atonement for his crimes. And a mercy that will wash away these... horrible, painful, and poisonous hues from his disfigured soul."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Nous ne pouvons pas laisser maître Scalander souffrir dans ce corps abject, n'est-ce pas ? La mort lui permettra d'expier ses crimes. Et notre miséricorde fera disparaître les horribles nuances qui empoisonnent douloureusement son âme défigurée. »
languages.original_text: "Surely we are not going to leave Master Scalander to suffer in this doomed body, are we? Death must come as atonement for his crimes. And a mercy that will wash away these... horrible, painful, and poisonous hues from his disfigured soul."

traits.locale_text: « Nous ne pouvons pas laisser maître Scalander souffrir dans ce corps abject, n'est-ce pas ? La mort lui permettra d'expier ses péchés. Et notre miséricorde fera disparaître les horribles nuances qui empoisonnent douloureusement son âme défigurée. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “我们总不能让斯卡兰德大师一直困在这诅咒的躯体中，永远受苦吧？他犯下了这样的罪行，需要以死赎罪。当然，我们也可以采取更加仁慈的手段……洗清那些可怕、痛苦、有毒的颜色，重新净化他饱受折磨的灵魂。”
languages.original_text: "Surely we are not going to leave Master Scalander to suffer in this doomed body, are we? Death must come as atonement for his crimes. And a mercy that will wash away these... horrible, painful, and poisonous hues from his disfigured soul."

traits.locale_text: “我们总不能让斯卡兰德大师一直困在这诅咒的躯体中，永远受苦吧？他犯下了这样的罪行，需要以死赎罪。当然，我们也可以采取更加仁慈的手段……洗清那些可怕、痛苦、有毒的颜色，重新净化他饱受折磨的灵魂。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「スカランダー様を、こんなおぞましい肉体の中で苦しませるわけにはいかないでしょう？彼は死によって罪を償うべきです。そうなれば慈悲によって…この恐ろしく、痛々しく、毒々しい色が彼の醜い魂から洗い流されるでしょう」
languages.original_text: "Surely we are not going to leave Master Scalander to suffer in this doomed body, are we? Death must come as atonement for his crimes. And a mercy that will wash away these... horrible, painful, and poisonous hues from his disfigured soul."

traits.locale_text: 「スカランダー様を、こんなおぞましい肉体の中で苦しませるわけにはいかないでしょう？彼は死によって罪を償うべきです。そうなれば慈悲によって…この恐ろしく、痛々しく、毒々しい色が彼の醜い魂から洗い流されるでしょう」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Wir werden Meister Scalander doch nicht in diesem verlorenen Körper leiden lassen, oder? Der Tod muss die Erlösung für seine Verbrechen sein. Und eine Gnade, die diese ... schrecklichen, schmerzhaften und giftigen Farbtöne von seiner entstellten Seele waschen wird."
languages.original_text: "Surely we are not going to leave Master Scalander to suffer in this doomed body, are we? Death must come as atonement for his crimes. And a mercy that will wash away these... horrible, painful, and poisonous hues from his disfigured soul."

traits.locale_text: "Wir werden Meister Scalander doch nicht in diesem verlorenen Körper leiden lassen, oder? Der Tod muss die Erlösung für seine begangenen Sünden sein. Und eine Gnade, die diese ... schrecklichen, schmerzhaften und giftigen Farbtöne von seiner entstellten Seele waschen wird."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «No iremos a dejar que maese Scalander sufra en ese cuerpo maldito, ¿verdad? Ha de expiar sus crímenes con la muerte. Y será una clemencia que lavará esas... horribles, dolorosas y ponzoñosas tonalidades de su alma desfigurada».
languages.original_text: "Surely we are not going to leave Master Scalander to suffer in this doomed body, are we? Death must come as atonement for his crimes. And a mercy that will wash away these... horrible, painful, and poisonous hues from his disfigured soul."

traits.locale_text: «No iremos a dejar que maese Scalander sufra en ese cuerpo maldito, ¿verdad? Ha de expiar sus pecados con la muerte. Y será una clemencia que lavará esas... horribles, dolorosas y ponzoñosas tonalidades de su alma desfigurada».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Üstat Scalander'ı bu lanetlenmiş bedende azaba terk edemeyiz. Haksız mıyım? Ölüm, suçlarının kefareti olacaktır. Merhamet ise... Biçimsizleşmiş ruhundaki habis, ızdıraplı ve zehirli izleri alır götürür."
languages.original_text: "Surely we are not going to leave Master Scalander to suffer in this doomed body, are we? Death must come as atonement for his crimes. And a mercy that will wash away these... horrible, painful, and poisonous hues from his disfigured soul."

traits.locale_text: "Üstat Scalander'ı bu lanetlenmiş bedende azaba terk edemeyiz. Haksız mıyım? Ölüm, suçlarının kefareti olacaktır. Merhamet ise... Biçimsizleşmiş ruhundaki habis, ıstıraplı ve zehirli izleri alır götürür."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
